name: mongoose-hose
description: Hose is plugin for your Mongoose schema that allows a fixed length array of nested docs. Useful for storing only the newest subdocs while leaving he oldest to be lost. When a doc is pushed into the array, if length is more than the limit the oldest will be deteted. First in First out (deleted). However this is done as a single atomic Mongo query to prevent race conditions.
author: Jason McIver
